name: 楊濠瞬
objective: 瞭解工程系統中常用數學之原理及應用，內容包含：1.常微分一階、二階及高階方程式之解法，2.拉普拉斯 (Laplace)變換及其在電路上之應用，3.向量分析及其在電磁學上之應用。
schedule:
Week 1: Course Overview
Week 2: First-Order Ordinary Differential Equations (ODEs)
Week 3: Separable ODEs, Exact ODEs, Linear ODEs
Week 4: Second-Order Linear ODEs
Week 5: Homogeneous Linear ODEs
Week 6: Nonhomogeneous ODEs
Week 7: Higher Order Linear ODEs
Week 8: Homogeneous Linear ODEs
Week 9: Midterm
Week 10: Systems of ODEs
Week 11: Phase Plane Method
Week 12: Qualitative Methods
Week 13: Laplace Transforms
Week 14: Transforms of Derivatives and Integrals
Week 15: Unit Step Function
Week 16: Convolution
Week 17: Vector Differential Calculus
Week 18: Final
materials: Erwin Kreyszig, Advanced Engineering Mathematics: 10th Edition, Wiley
